welcome.message: sign up to find a new wave of living

signup.heading: Welcome to roomeight
signup.title: Sign Up
signup.enterDetails: Please enter your details below. The password must be at least 8 characters long.

chooseStatus.heading: What are you looking for?
chooseStatus.select: Please select what applies to you
chooseStatus.roommate: My flat is looking for a new roommate
chooseStatus.flat: I want to access an existing flat profile

addPictures.heading: Add pictures
addPictures.infoFlat: To give a good impression of your flat, add pictures of the apartment, the free room and social events :)
addPictures.infoSingle: To give a good impression of yourself, add some more pictures that represent your personality :)

completePersonalProfile.heading: Complete your personal profile
completePersonalProfile.info: Choose your profile picture and tell us something about yourself.
completePersonalProfile.descriptionPlaceholder: Add a longer description of your job, hobbies or roomeight expectations

completeSingleProfile.heading: Tell us something about yourself
completeSingleProfile.info: Which tags describe you best? When will you be able to move in?

completeFlatProfile.heading: Tell us something about your flat

roomInfo.heading: Spit some facts about the free room!

flatInfo.heading: Who are you and your roomies?
flatInfo.info: Tell your potential new roomeights something about your flat, so they can get an idea of what it's like to live with you!
flatInfo.descriptionPlaceholder: Add a longer description of your jobs, hobbies or roomeight expectations
flatInfo.biographyPlaceholder: That's your flat in one sentence

done.heading: This is it!
done.title: Are you ready to see some profiles?

errors.userAlreadyExists: A user with this email already exists. Try logging in or choosing a different email address.
errors.problemWithApplication: There is a problem with the application. Please try again later.
errors.serverError: There is a problem with the server. Please try again later.
errors.userWithEmailNotFound: No user with this email can be found. Have you registered yet?
